data.name: No Frills Owner Occupied Home Loan – Variable Rate LVR >90%
data.description: No Frills Owner Occupied Home Loan – Variable Rate LVR >90%

features.additionalInfo: Redraw of repaid principal above minimum required is available
Access is available to online banking features for the product
An account of this product type can be used to receive funds as a result of a BSB/Number based NPP payment
An account of this product type can be used as the target of an NPP PayID

constraints.additionalInfo: 90% of the property value plus Lenders Mortgage Insurance Premium

eligibility.additionalInfo: Individuals must be citizens or permanent residents of Australia.
You will need to become a member of the Credit Union before The Capricornian can accept a loan application.
New Loans Only or existing borrowers who apply for an increase in their home loan of $150,000 or more.
Variable - Loan to valuation ratio greater than 90%

fees.name: MORTGAGE_APPLICATION_FEE-EQUAL_TO_OR_LESS_THAN_80%
fees.additionalInfo: Includes one valuation up to the cost of $300 - Excludes additional valuation costs and solicitors costs to prepare mortgage documents and settlement fees.

fees.name: MORTGAGE_APPLICATION_FEE-GREATER_THAN_80%
fees.additionalInfo: Includes one valuation up to the cost of $300 - Excludes additional valuation costs and solicitors costs to prepare mortgage documents and settlement fees.

fees.name: MORTGAGE_APPLICATION_FEE_FURTHER_ADVANCE-EQUAL_TO_OR_LESS_THAN_80%
fees.additionalInfo: Includes one valuation up to the cost of $300 - Excludes additional valuation costs and solicitors costs to prepare mortgage documents and settlement fees.

fees.name: MORTGAGE_APPLICATION_FEE_FURTHER_ADVANCE-GREATER_THAN_80%
fees.additionalInfo: Includes one valuation up to the cost of $300 - Excludes additional valuation costs and solicitors costs to prepare mortgage documents and settlement fees.

fees.name: MORTGAGE_DISCHARGE_FEE-SETTLEMENT
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is payable in addition to solicitors fees, registration, searches and other third party fees that may apply.

fees.name: MORTGAGE_DISCHARGE_FEE-NON_SETTLEMENT
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is payable in addition to solicitors fees, registration, searches and other third party fees that may apply.

fees.name: FIXED_RATE_LOCK
fees.additionalInfo: Fee is greater than 0.15% of the amount of credit or $395 where funding is more than 60 days from the date of the Offer and Loan Contract

lendingRates.additionalInfo: Comparison rate based on $150,000 loan over 25 years. WARNING: This comparison rate is true only for the examples given and may not include all fees and charges. Different terms, fees or other loan amounts might result in a different comparison rate.
